item.title: 特鲁多试图让 "焦虑不安 "的加拿大人放心特朗普的回归
item.description: 加拿大总理贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）和他的内阁部长们试图平息人们对美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将对贸易造成严重破坏并可能摧毁加拿大出口导向型经济的担忧。【原文：Prime Minister Justin Trudeau and his cabinet ministers tried to calm fears that US President-Elect Donald Trump will wreak havoc on trade and potentially devastate Canada’s export-driven economy.】

item.title: 特朗普获胜后，欧洲债券卖家将大举回归
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得美国大选前一周的暂停之后，欧洲最快可能在本周四恢复债务销售，公司债券发行将重新列入菜单。【原文：Debt sales could return to Europe as soon as Thursday, with corporate issuance back on the menu after a week-long pause in the lead-up to Donald Trump’s US election win.】

item.title: 顶级贷款人阿布拉收购巴西航空公司，戈尔计划破产退出
item.description: Gol Linhas Aereas Inteligentes SA 已达成一项全面的重组协议，其最大的贷款方 Abra Group Ltd. 将接管这家巴西廉价航空公司，并在明年使该公司摆脱破产保护。【原文：Gol Linhas Aereas Inteligentes SA has struck a sweeping restructuring deal that will see its top lender, Abra Group Ltd., take over the Brazilian budget airline and get the company out of Chapter 11 next year.】

item.title: 特朗普获胜引发赤字担忧后，市政债券暴跌
item.description: 在选民选举唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）为美国总统后，市政债券在周三的早盘交易中暴跌。此前，由于担心特朗普的政策会扩大已经臃肿的预算赤字并导致通胀飙升，美国国债遭到抛售。【原文：Municipal bonds plummeted in early trading on Wednesday after voters elected Donald Trump as US president. The move followed a rout in US Treasuries, which sold off over concerns that Trump’s policies will widen an already bloated budget deficit and cause inflation to surge.】

item.title: 特朗普回归有望再次颠覆美国外交政策
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）即将重返白宫，他发誓要颠覆与盟友和敌人的关系，而且几乎没有面临上次限制他推动 "美国优先 "的制约因素。【原文：Donald Trump is headed back to the White House, vowing to upend relations with allies and enemies alike and facing few of the constraints that limited his “America first” push last time.】

item.title: 亚马逊创纪录，强劲业绩加速全年涨势
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）股价周三创下盘中纪录，这是大型科技公司仍受投资者青睐的最新例证。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. shares hit an intraday record on Wednesday, in the latest example of how big tech remains a favored part of the market for investors.】

item.title: 据说收购公司将收购利洁时 60 亿英镑的家庭护理资产
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Advent International 和 Apollo Global Management Inc.等收购公司正在研究收购利洁时集团（Reckitt Benckiser Group Plc）家庭护理资产的可能性。【原文：Advent International and Apollo Global Management Inc. are among buyout firms studying a potential acquisition of Reckitt Benckiser Group Plc’s homecare assets, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 莫桑比克主要港口在选举骚乱后停止接收货物
item.description: 莫桑比克的马普托港是重要的铬出口枢纽，由于这个东南非国家持续的选举动乱，该港口已经停止接收货物。【原文：Mozambique’s Maputo port, a key chrome export hub, has stopped receiving cargo due to ongoing election unrest in the southeast African nation.】

item.title: 津巴布韦将于本月就 210 亿美元债务问题举行会谈
item.description: 津巴布韦将于本月晚些时候恢复与债权人的谈判，以重组 210 亿美元的外债，从而摆脱自 1999 年以来一直被国际资本市场拒之门外的违约局面。【原文：Zimbabwe will resume talks with creditors later this month to restructure $21 billion in external debt as it seeks to exit a default that’s kept it locked out of international capital markets since 1999.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长金多斯警告特朗普关税计划的 "巨大 "影响
item.description: 欧洲中央银行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）表示，如果美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）实施他在竞选期间威胁要征收的进口关税，全球经济的增长和通胀将面临潜在的不利冲击。【原文：The global economy faces potentially detrimental shocks to growth and inflation if US President-elect Donald Trump implements the kind of import tariffs he threatened during his campaign, according to European Central Bank Vice President Luis de Guindos.】

item.title: 期货市场显示比特币破纪录反弹势头强劲
item.description: 期货市场暗示，唐纳德-特朗普在美国总统大选中获胜引发的比特币破纪录涨势可能才刚刚开始。【原文：The futures market is suggesting that the record-breaking rally in Bitcoin triggered by Donald Trump’s victory in the US presidential election may just be getting started.】

item.title: 贝莱德准备成立 13 亿美元的私人信贷延续基金
item.description: 知情人士透露，贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：BlackRock Inc. is setting up a private credit loan fund that will allow it to raise as much as $1.3 billion it can distribute to existing investors, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 华尔街的反应：特朗普获胜，风险全开
item.description: 周三早些时候，随着唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在与副总统卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）的竞争中取得决定性胜利，成功连任白宫总统，风险狂潮笼罩着金融资产。【原文：A risk-on frenzy enveloped financial assets early Wednesday as Donald Trump clinched the White House for a second term, decisively winning what had been seen as a neck-and-neck race against Vice President Kamala Harris.】

item.title: 阿斯利康称现任和前任高管卷入中国调查
item.description: 阿斯利康公司（AstraZeneca Plc）的两名现任和两名前任高管正在中国接受调查，调查涉嫌违反药品进口和数据隐私方面的法律。【原文：Two current and two former senior executives at AstraZeneca Plc are under investigation in China in an ongoing probe into alleged breaches of laws around drug importations and data privacy, the company said.】

item.title: Lyft 与 Mobileye 合作达成一系列自动驾驶协议
item.description: Lyft Inc. 宣布与自动驾驶技术供应商（包括英特尔公司分拆出来的 Mobileye Global Inc.【原文：Lyft Inc. announced three new partnerships with autonomous driving technology vendors, including Intel Corp. spinoff Mobileye Global Inc., as it plays catch-up in offering driverless rides on its platform.】

item.title: 波多黎各执政党抵御 "坏兔子"，保持领先地位
item.description: 波多黎各的詹尼弗-冈萨雷斯-科隆（Jenniffer Gonzalez-Colon）是唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的支持者和终身共和党人，她在总督竞选中遥遥领先，挫败了超级巨星坏兔子（Bad Bunny）试图左右选票对她不利的企图。【原文：Puerto Rico’s Jenniffer Gonzalez-Colon, a Donald Trump supporter and lifelong Republican, is leading the race for governor, bucking an attempt by superstar Bad Bunny to sway the vote against her.】

item.title: 年底期限临近，瑞士继续推进脱欧谈判
item.description: 瑞士表示，它仍未就与欧盟达成的新协议中的一些关键部分达成协议，这使谈判离双方都希望在年底前完成的最后期限越来越近。【原文：Switzerland said it still hasn’t reached an agreement with the European Union on some key parts of a proposed new deal with the bloc, pushing talks closer to a year-end deadline both sides would like to meet.】

item.title: 莫桑比克法院命令投票机构澄清选举结果
item.description: 莫桑比克最高法院下令选举当局澄清上月选举结果中的不一致之处，反政府抗议活动日益高涨，最终将于周四在首都马普托举行游行。【原文：Mozambique’s top court ordered the electoral authority to clarify discrepancies in last month’s election results, amid growing anti-government protests that are set to culminate in a march in the capital Maputo on Thursday.】

item.title: 播客没有决定大选，但它们帮了大忙
item.description: 随着美国大选出人意料地迅速落下帷幕，我们现在可以尝试总结一下网络媒体在其中所扮演的角色。但首先...【原文：With the US election coming to a surprisingly swift resolution, we can now try to draw lessons about the role of internet media in it all. But first...】

item.title: 在特朗普市场，最大的问题是 "MAGA "2.0 要花多少钱
item.description: 准备迎接唐纳德-特朗普总统 2.0 的投资者知道两件事：新政府将努力推行他的 "让美国再次伟大 "议程，而随之而来的账单可能会高得吓人。【原文：Investors bracing for President Donald Trump 2.0 know two things: The new administration will seek to ram through his “Make America Great Again” agenda, and the ensuing bill could be sky-high.】

item.title: 法国确认 2024 年预算赤字预计为国内生产总值的 6.1
item.description: 法国政府证实，预计 2024 年预算赤字将升至经济产出的 6.1%，因为政府取消了一些支出计划，以减轻税收收入意外疲软带来的部分巨大影响。【原文：France’s government confirmed it expects the budget deficit to rise to 6.1% of economic output in 2024 as it canceled some spending plans to mitigate part of the huge impact from unexpectedly weak tax revenues.】

item.title: 特朗普再次押注通胀，美债创大流行以来最大跌幅
item.description: 由于投资者再次押注唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫将提振通胀，美国国债下滑，30 年期国债跌幅创大流行病爆发以来最大。【原文：US Treasuries slid, with the 30-year bond falling the most since the pandemic struck, as investors piled back into bets that Donald Trump’s return to the White House will boost inflation.】

item.title: 特朗普续集有望撼动全球能源市场
item.description:
当选总统主张增加钻探、征收高额关税和减少气候限制。【原文：

The president-elect advocates more drilling, high tariffs and fewer climate restrictions.

item.title: 塔塔钢铁第二季度利润因价格疲软而下降
item.description: 塔塔钢铁公司（Tata Steel Ltd. ）公布的第二季度利润超过了平均预期，但比前三个月下降了 13%，这表明合金需求和价格疲软。【原文：Tata Steel Ltd. reported a second-quarter profit that beat average estimates, while declining 13% from the prior three-months period, a sign of weak demand and prices of the alloy.】

item.title: Arm 90% 的涨幅凸显了高倍数、低增长的问题
item.description: 今年表现最出色的人工智能股票之一，可能即将面临粗鲁的觉醒。【原文：One of the year’s best-performing artificial intelligence stocks could be about to face a rude awakening.】

item.title: 美国大选刺激亚洲货币走软，韩元创两年新低
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普赢得美国总统大选后，韩国的韩元跌至两年来的最低点，与其他亚洲货币一起遭到抛售。【原文：South Korea’s won dropped to its lowest in two years, selling off alongside other Asian currencies after Donald Trump won the US presidential vote.】

item.title: 乌克兰电网停止支付债券等待债务重组
item.description: 乌克兰电网运营商 NPC Ukrenergo 暂停偿还 2028 年到期的美元票据，直至与债券持有人达成重组协议。【原文：Ukraine’s power grid operator NPC Ukrenergo suspended servicing its dollar-denominated notes maturing in 2028 until it reaches a restructuring deal with bondholders.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率再次上升，近期升幅为两年来最大
item.description: 美国抵押贷款利率继续攀升，进一步抑制了再融资和购房活动。【原文：US mortgage rates continued to climb, putting a further damper on refinancing and homebuying activity.】

item.title: 俄罗斯称 10 月份原油产量符合欧佩克+的目标
item.description: 据熟悉能源部数据的人士称，俄罗斯的数据显示，该国 10 月份的原油产量几乎符合欧佩克+协议规定的目标。【原文：Russian data show the nation’s crude production in October was almost in line with its target under the OPEC+ agreement, according to people familiar with figures from the Energy Ministry.】

item.title: 高盛、花旗因希望特朗普减少税收和监管而飙升
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.）、摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Shares of US banks including Citigroup Inc., JPMorgan Chase & Co. and Goldman Sachs Group Inc. surged in premarket trading as investors wagered that Donald Trump would make good on his promises to lower taxes and reduce regulation for the industry.】
